key.name: view-mode
key.summary: View mode for the panel button
key.description: Controls how the panel button displays information. Options: 'compact' (icon only), 'expanded' (icon + timer + task), 'custom' (use individual toggles)

key.name: show-timer
key.description: Display the countdown timer next to the icon

key.name: show-controls
key.description: Display start/pause, stop, and complete buttons in the popup menu

key.name: show-task-name
key.description: Display the name of the currently focused task

key.name: show-next-task
key.description: Display the next suggested task in the popup menu

key.name: button-position
key.description: Position of the panel button in the top bar. Options: 'left', 'center', 'right'
